summary: The document is a form associated with the JFK assassination system, detailing agency and document information. It includes a letter from Cecil L. Griggs, related to DOD-affiliated personnel and incident investigations, dated 16 November 1967. The document, unclassified and released with deletions on 03/20/95, contains military and personal details of PFC Kenneth Co Griggs.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK Assassination System Identification Form.
It involves DOD-affiliated personnel and incident investigations.
Contains a copy of a letter written by Cecil L. Griggs in 1967.
The document is unclassified and was released with deletions on 03/20/95.
References military and personal details of PFC Kenneth Co Griggs.
